title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Meet the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart — a sturdy, easy-to-use helper for your yard and home.

What it is:
- A strong garden cart made of steel mesh.
- Color: green.
- Size of the cart bed: 34 inches long by 18 inches wide.
- Height: about 37 inches tall.
- Weight of the cart: about 36.6 pounds.

What it does for you:
- Carries up to 400 pounds, so you can move soil, plants, firewood, groceries, or tools with fewer trips.
- Side panels lift off easily. Remove them to carry bigger or awkward items.
- Converts into a flatbed cart in seconds for large, flat loads.

Easy to handle:
- Four wheels for steady balance—no lifting like a wheelbarrow.
- Large 10-inch air-filled tires roll smoothly over grass, gravel, and uneven ground.
- Tight turning helps you steer around corners and garden beds.
- Good ground clearance so it won’t get stuck on bumps.
- Simple straight-pull handle is comfortable to hold.

Simple to set up:
- Quick, straightforward assembly with clear parts.
- Durable steel mesh is tough and long-lasting.

Peace of mind:
- 1-year limited warranty.

Perfect for:
- Gardening, yard cleanups, moving pots and bags of soil.
- Hauling laundry, packages, or pet supplies around the house or garage.
- Anyone who wants to move heavy items with less strain on the back and knees.

In short: it’s a stable, easy-rolling cart that does the heavy lifting for you, turns easily, and can switch to a flatbed when needed. Load it up, pull gently, and let the cart do the work.
